pages.text: $(bgreen)Wall Nut$() can feel a kind of tingling, like a relaxing back rub, when being constantly chewed.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)50$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)defender$() plant that has high health, and it can $(bred)attract enemies in 5 * 5 range to attack itself$().
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will gain a large amount of $(l)defence life$() to protecte itself.
